commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew: /** * Marks the current token as keyword iff set to true. * * @param isKeyword * true iff the current token is a keyword, otherwise * false. */ public void setKeyword(boolean isKeyword);
commits.sourceOld: /** * Marks the current token as keyword iff set to true. * * @param isKeyword * true iff the current token is a keyword, otherwise * false. */ public void setKeyword(boolean isKeyword);
